item.title: How To: pass GPU to VM and back without X restart
item.description:
TLDR: If you use FOSS drivers with DRI3 you now can do this:

  • Use GPU on Linux for any 3D applications.
  • Pass it into VM and do anything with it.
  • Once VM is shutdown use GPU on host again.

Everything without reboot and X server restart.

item.title: Experimental static website
item.description: This is my first attempt to create personal website using Hugo. I’m used wordpress for almost ten years and made many projects with it, but for personal website that will be rarely updated it’s feels like overkill and ability to host it on GitHub Pages is nice advantage too.
